00017 extern BOOLEAN gfAutoBandageFailed;

00019 //
00020 // This file contains code devoted to the player AI-controlled medical system.  Maybe it
00021 // can be used or adapted for the enemies too...
00022 //
00023 
00024 #define NOT_GOING_TO_DIE -1
00025 #define NOT_GOING_TO_COLLAPSE -1
00026 
00027 // can this grunt be bandaged by a teammate?
00028 BOOLEAN CanCharacterBeAutoBandagedByTeammate( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier );
00029 
00030 //c an this grunt help anyone else out?
00031 BOOLEAN CanCharacterAutoBandageTeammate( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier );

00033 BOOLEAN FindAutobandageClimbPoint( INT16 sDesiredGridNo, BOOLEAN fClimbUp )
00034 {
00035       // checks for existance of location to climb up to building, not occupied by a medic
00036       BUILDING *  pBuilding;
00037       UINT8                   ubNumClimbSpots;
00038       UINT8                   ubLoop;
00039       UINT8                   ubWhoIsThere;
00040 
00041       pBuilding = FindBuilding( sDesiredGridNo );
00042       if (!pBuilding)
00043       {
00044             return( FALSE );
00045       }
00046 
00047       ubNumClimbSpots = pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots;
00048 
00049       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < ubNumClimbSpots; ubLoop++ )
00050       {
00051             ubWhoIsThere = WhoIsThere2( pBuilding->sUpClimbSpots[ ubLoop ], 1 );
00052             if ( ubWhoIsThere != NOBODY && !CanCharacterAutoBandageTeammate( MercPtrs[ ubWhoIsThere ] ) )
00053             {
00054                   continue;
00055             }
00056             ubWhoIsThere = WhoIsThere2( pBuilding->sDownClimbSpots[ ubLoop ], 0 );
00057             if ( ubWhoIsThere != NOBODY && !CanCharacterAutoBandageTeammate( MercPtrs[ ubWhoIsThere ] ) )
00058             {
00059                   continue;
00060             }
00061             return( TRUE );
00062       }
00063 
00064       return( FALSE );
00065 }
00066 
00067 BOOLEAN FullPatientCheck( SOLDIERTYPE * pPatient )
00068 {
00069       UINT8                               cnt;
00070       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00071 
00072       if ( CanCharacterAutoBandageTeammate( pPatient ) )
00073       {
00074             // can bandage self!
00075             return( TRUE );
00076       }
00077 
00078       if ( pPatient->bLevel != 0 )
00079       {     // look for a clear spot for jumping up 
00080 
00081             // special "closest" search that ignores climb spots IF they are occupied by non-medics
00082             return( FindAutobandageClimbPoint( pPatient->sGridNo, TRUE ) );
00083       }
00084       else
00085       {
00086             // run though the list of chars on team
00087             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00088             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00089             {
00090                   // can this character help out?
00091                   if ( CanCharacterAutoBandageTeammate( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
00092                   {
00093                         // can this guy path to the patient?
00094                         if ( pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
00095                         {
00096                               // do a regular path check
00097                               if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, pPatient->sGridNo, 0, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
00098                               {
00099                                     return( TRUE );
00100                               }
00101                         }                 
00102                         else
00103                         {
00104                               // if on different levels, assume okay
00105                               return( TRUE );
00106                         }
00107                   }
00108             }
00109       }
00110       return( FALSE );
00111 }

00113 BOOLEAN CanAutoBandage( BOOLEAN fDoFullCheck )
00114 {
00115       // returns false if we should stop being in auto-bandage mode
00116       UINT8                         cnt;
00117       UINT8                         ubMedics = 0, ubPatients = 0;
00118       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00119       static UINT8      ubIDForFullCheck = NOBODY;
00120 
00121       // run though the list of chars on team
00122       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00123       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00124       {
00125             // can this character help out?
00126             if( CanCharacterAutoBandageTeammate( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
00127             {
00128                   // yep, up the number of medics in sector
00129                   ubMedics++;
00130             }
00131       }
00132 
00133       if ( ubMedics == 0 )
00134       {
00135             // no one that can help
00136             return( FALSE );
00137       }
00138 
00139       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00140       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00141       {
00142             // can this character be helped out by a teammate?
00143             if ( CanCharacterBeAutoBandagedByTeammate( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
00144             {
00145                   // yep, up the number of patients awaiting treatment in sector
00146                   ubPatients++;
00147                   if (fDoFullCheck)
00148                   {
00149                         if ( ubIDForFullCheck == NOBODY )
00150                         {
00151                               // do this guy NEXT time around
00152                               ubIDForFullCheck = cnt;
00153                         }
00154                         else if ( cnt == ubIDForFullCheck )
00155                         {
00156                               // test this guy
00157                               if ( FullPatientCheck( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
00158                               {
00159                                     // shit!
00160                                     gfAutoBandageFailed = TRUE;
00161                                     return( FALSE );
00162                               }
00163                               // set ID for full check to NOBODY; will be set to someone later in loop, or to
00164                               // the first guy on the next pass
00165                               ubIDForFullCheck = NOBODY;
00166                         }
00167                   }
00168             }
00169             // is this guy REACHABLE??
00170       }
00171 
00172       if ( ubPatients == 0 )
00173       {
00174             // there is no one to help
00175             return( FALSE );
00176       }
00177       else
00178       {
00179             // got someone that can help and help wanted
00180             return( TRUE );
00181       }
00182 }

00184 
00185 BOOLEAN CanCharacterAutoBandageTeammate( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00186 // can this soldier autobandage others in sector
00187 {
00188       // if the soldier isn't active or in sector, we have problems..leave
00189       if ( !(pSoldier->bActive) || !(pSoldier->bInSector) || ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || (pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) )
00190       {
00191             return( FALSE );
00192       }
00193 
00194       // they must have oklife or more, not be collapsed, have some level of medical competence, and have a med kit of some sort
00195       if ( (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE) && !(pSoldier->bCollapsed) && (pSoldier->bMedical > 0) && (FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_MEDKIT ) != NO_SLOT) )
00196       {
00197             return( TRUE );
00198       }
00199 
00200       return( FALSE );
00201 }
00202

00204 // can this soldier autobandage others in sector
00205 BOOLEAN CanCharacterBeAutoBandagedByTeammate( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00206 {
00207       // if the soldier isn't active or in sector, we have problems..leave
00208       if ( !(pSoldier->bActive) || !(pSoldier->bInSector) || ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || (pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) )
00209       {
00210             return( FALSE );
00211       }
00212 
00213       if ( (pSoldier->bLife > 0) && (pSoldier->bBleeding > 0) )
00214       {
00215             // someone's bleeding and not being given first aid!
00216             return( TRUE );
00217       }
00218 
00219       return( FALSE );
00220 }

00222 INT8 FindBestPatient( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, BOOLEAN * pfDoClimb )
00223 {
00224       UINT8                               cnt, cnt2;
00225       INT16                               bBestPriority = 0, sBestAdjGridNo;
00226       INT16                               sPatientGridNo, sBestPatientGridNo;
00227       INT16                               sShortestPath = 1000, sPathCost, sOtherMedicPathCost;
00228       SOLDIERTYPE *           pPatient;
00229       SOLDIERTYPE *           pBestPatient = NULL;
00230       SOLDIERTYPE *           pOtherMedic;
00231       INT8                                bPatientPriority;
00232       UINT8                               ubDirection;
00233       INT16                               sAdjustedGridNo, sAdjacentGridNo, sOtherAdjacentGridNo;
00234       INT16                               sClimbGridNo, sBestClimbGridNo = NOWHERE, sShortestClimbPath = 1000;
00235       BOOLEAN                             fClimbingNecessary;
00236 
00237       gubGlobalPathFlags = PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE;
00238 
00239       // search for someone who needs aid
00240       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
00241       for ( pPatient = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pPatient++)
00242       {
00243             if ( !(pPatient->bActive) || !(pPatient->bInSector) )
00244             {
00245                   continue; // NEXT!!!
00246             }
00247 
00248             if (pPatient->bLife > 0 && pPatient->bBleeding && pPatient->ubServiceCount == 0)
00249             {
00250                   if (pPatient->bLife < OKLIFE)
00251                   {
00252                         bPatientPriority = 3;
00253                   }
00254                   else if (pPatient->bLife < OKLIFE * 2)
00255                   {
00256                         bPatientPriority = 2;
00257                   }
00258                   else
00259                   {
00260                         bPatientPriority = 1;
00261                   }
00262 
00263                   if (bPatientPriority >= bBestPriority)
00264                   {
00265                         if ( !ClimbingNecessary( pSoldier, pPatient->sGridNo, pPatient->bLevel ) )
00266                         {
00267 
00268                               sPatientGridNo = pPatient->sGridNo;
00269                               sAdjacentGridNo = FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sPatientGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, FALSE, FALSE );
00270                               if ( sAdjacentGridNo == -1 && gAnimControl[ pPatient->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
00271                               {
00272                                     // prone; could be the base tile is inaccessible but the rest isn't...
00273                                     for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; cnt2++ )
00274                                     {
00275                                           sPatientGridNo = pPatient->sGridNo + DirectionInc( cnt2 );
00276                                           if ( WhoIsThere2( sPatientGridNo, pPatient->bLevel ) == pPatient->ubID )
00277                                           {
00278                                                 // patient is also here, try this location
00279                                                 sAdjacentGridNo = FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sPatientGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, FALSE, FALSE );
00280                                                 if ( sAdjacentGridNo != -1 )
00281                                                 {
00282                                                       break;
00283                                                 }
00284                                           }
00285                                     }
00286                               }
00287 
00288                               if (sAdjacentGridNo != -1)
00289                               {
00290                                     if (sAdjacentGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo)
00291                                     {
00292                                           sPathCost = 1;
00293                                     }
00294                                     else
00295                                     {
00296                                           sPathCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sAdjacentGridNo, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, RUNNING, FALSE, FALSE, 0);
00297                                     }
00298 
00299                                     if ( sPathCost != 0 )
00300                                     {
00301                                           // we can get there... can anyone else?
00302 
00303                                           if ( pPatient->ubAutoBandagingMedic != NOBODY && pPatient->ubAutoBandagingMedic != pSoldier->ubID )
00304                                           {
00305                                                 // only switch to this patient if our distance is closer than
00306                                                 // the other medic's
00307                                                 pOtherMedic = MercPtrs[ pPatient->ubAutoBandagingMedic ];
00308                                                 sOtherAdjacentGridNo = FindAdjacentGridEx( pOtherMedic, sPatientGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, FALSE, FALSE );
00309                                                 if (sOtherAdjacentGridNo != -1)
00310                                                 {
00311 
00312                                                       if (sOtherAdjacentGridNo == pOtherMedic->sGridNo)
00313                                                       {
00314                                                             sOtherMedicPathCost = 1;
00315                                                       }
00316                                                       else
00317                                                       {
00318                                                             sOtherMedicPathCost = PlotPath( pOtherMedic, sOtherAdjacentGridNo, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, RUNNING, FALSE, FALSE, 0);
00319                                                       }
00320 
00321                                                       if (sPathCost >= sOtherMedicPathCost)
00322                                                       {
00323                                                             // this patient is best served by the merc moving to them now
00324                                                             continue;
00325                                                       }
00326                                                 }
00327                                           }
00328 
00329                                           if (bPatientPriority == bBestPriority)
00330                                           {
00331                                                 // compare path distances
00332                                                 if ( sPathCost > sShortestPath )
00333                                                 {
00334                                                       continue;
00335                                                 }
00336                                           }
00337 
00338 
00339                                           sShortestPath = sPathCost;
00340                                           pBestPatient = pPatient;
00341                                           sBestPatientGridNo = sPatientGridNo;
00342                                           bBestPriority = bPatientPriority;
00343                                           sBestAdjGridNo = sAdjacentGridNo;
00344 
00345                                     }
00346                               }
00347 
00348                         }
00349                         else
00350                         {
00351                               sClimbGridNo = NOWHERE;
00352                               // see if guy on another building etc and we need to climb somewhere
00353                               sPathCost = EstimatePathCostToLocation( pSoldier, pPatient->sGridNo, pPatient->bLevel, FALSE, &fClimbingNecessary, &sClimbGridNo );
00354                               // if we can get there
00355                               if ( sPathCost != 0 && fClimbingNecessary && sPathCost < sShortestClimbPath )
00356                               {
00357                                     sBestClimbGridNo = sClimbGridNo;
00358                                     sShortestClimbPath = sPathCost;
00359                               }
00360 
00361                         }
00362 
00363                   }
00364 
00365             }
00366       }
00367 
00368       gubGlobalPathFlags = 0;
00369 
00370       if (pBestPatient)
00371       {
00372             if (pBestPatient->ubAutoBandagingMedic != NOBODY)
00373             {
00374                   // cancel that medic
00375                   CancelAIAction( MercPtrs[ pBestPatient->ubAutoBandagingMedic ], TRUE );
00376             }
00377             pBestPatient->ubAutoBandagingMedic = pSoldier->ubID;
00378             *pfDoClimb = FALSE;
00379             if ( CardinalSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sBestPatientGridNo ) == 1 )
00380             {
00381                   pSoldier->usActionData = sBestPatientGridNo;
00382                   return( AI_ACTION_GIVE_AID );
00383             }
00384             else
00385             {
00386                   pSoldier->usActionData = sBestAdjGridNo;
00387                   return( AI_ACTION_GET_CLOSER );
00388             }
00389       }
00390       else if (sBestClimbGridNo != NOWHERE )
00391       {
00392             *pfDoClimb = TRUE;
00393             pSoldier->usActionData = sBestClimbGridNo;
00394             return( AI_ACTION_MOVE_TO_CLIMB );
00395       }
00396       else
00397       {
00398             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00399       }
00400 }

00402 INT8 DecideAutoBandage( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00403 {
00404       INT8                          bSlot;
00405       BOOLEAN                       fDoClimb;
00406 
00407 
00408       if (pSoldier->bMedical == 0 || pSoldier->ubServicePartner != NOBODY)
00409       {
00410             // don't/can't make decision
00411             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00412       }
00413 
00414       bSlot = FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_MEDKIT );
00415       if (bSlot == NO_SLOT)
00416       {
00417             // no medical kit!
00418             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00419       }
00420 
00421       if (pSoldier->bBleeding)
00422       {
00423             // heal self first!
00424             pSoldier->usActionData = pSoldier->sGridNo;
00425             if (bSlot != HANDPOS)
00426             {
00427                   pSoldier->bSlotItemTakenFrom = bSlot;
00428 
00429                   SwapObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]) );
00430                   /*
00431                   memset( &TempObj, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
00432                   // move the med kit out to temp obj
00433                   SwapObjs( &TempObj, &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]) );
00434                   // swap the med kit with whatever was in the hand
00435                   SwapObjs( &TempObj, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) );
00436                   // replace whatever was in the hand somewhere in inventory
00437                   AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &TempObj, FALSE );
00438                   */
00439             }
00440             return( AI_ACTION_GIVE_AID );
00441       }
00442 
00443 //    pSoldier->usActionData = FindClosestPatient( pSoldier );
00444       pSoldier->bAction = FindBestPatient( pSoldier, &fDoClimb );
00445       if (pSoldier->bAction != AI_ACTION_NONE)
00446       {
00447             pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = RUNNING;
00448             if (bSlot != HANDPOS)
00449             {
00450                   pSoldier->bSlotItemTakenFrom = bSlot;
00451 
00452                   SwapObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]) );
00453             }
00454             return( pSoldier->bAction );
00455       }
00456 
00457       // do nothing
00458       return( AI_ACTION_NONE );     
00459 }
